content:
My advisor Robert Rand and I have started a new mailing list for announcements & discussion among the quantum programming languages and verification community.

Thanks to @k4rtik for setting this up! Please sign up for the list serve if you want to send or receive announcements related to quantum languages and verification! https://twitter.com/k4rtik/status/1582752279760842753

- PLanQC (@planqc_conf)

If you are interested at the intersection of those areas, we invite you to join by using the Subscribe button at https://lists.uchicago.edu/web/info/qplv or by sending a blank email to qplv-subscribe@lists.uchicago.edu and help spread the word.

PS: I also maintain a bibliography for the area at https://quantumpl.github.io/bib/ which many people find helpful.

Thanks
Fantastic initiative! Thank you :blush:
